option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="purple_700">#FF3700B3</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Color Palette --> <!-- Greens - Light Theme --> <color name="honeydew">#FFFFF3F3</color> <color name="light_green">#FFDFF7E2</color> <color name="caribbean_green">#FF00D09E</color>
<!-- Greens - Dark Theme --> <color name="cyprus">#FF0E3E3E</color> <color name="fence_green">#FF052224</color> <color name="void">#FF031314</color>
<!-- Blues --> <color name="light_blue">#FF6DB6FE</color> <color name="vivid_blue">#FF3299FF</color> <color name="ocean_blue">#FF0068FF</color>
<!-- Base Colors --> <color name="black">#FF000000</color> <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color>
<!-- Legacy Colors (kept for compatibility) --> <color name="purple_200">#FFBB86FC</color> <color name="purple_500">#FF6200EE</color> <color name="purple_700">#FF3700B3</color> <color name="teal_200">#FF03DAC5</color> <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Light Theme --> <style name="ThemeLight" parent="Theme.Material3.Light"> <!-- Primary color for light theme --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/caribbean_green</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/light_green</item>
<!-- Secondary color --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/light_blue</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/vivid_blue</item>
<!-- Background and surface colors --> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/white</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/honeydew</item>
<!-- Text colors --> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/fence_green</item> <item name="android:textColorSecondary">@color/cyprus</item> </style>
<!-- Dark Theme --> <style name="ThemeDark" parent="Theme.Material3.Dark"> <!-- Primary color for dark theme --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/caribbean_green</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/fence_green</item>
<!-- Secondary color --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/ocean_blue</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/vivid_blue</item>
<!-- Background and surface colors --> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/void</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/cyprus</item>
<!-- Text colors --> <item name="android:textColorPrimary">@color/white</item> <item name="android:textColorSecondary">@color/light_green</item> </style> </resources>
